original: <color=#FFE9D6>農業值</color>、<color=#FFE9D6>商業值</color>、<color=#FFE9D6>技術值</color>達上限後，可以指派武將提升據點規模。※據點受腹地影響，據點規模最大上限有所不同。
text: <color=#FFE9D6>Agricultural value</color>, <color=#FFE9D6>Commercial value</color>, <color=#FFE9D6>Technical value</color> After reaching the upper limit, generals can be assigned to increase the scale of the base . ※A base is affected by the hinterland, and the maximum size of a base varies.
